comments.author: ZedTheYeti.2956
comments.body: Yea I wondered if it was the data being tracked in an odd way. Thinks for the info! I’ll watch for the fix.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Currently technical reasons — the shrine state (and ruins before them) isn’t piped out of the game servers in a manner the API can currently access (e.g., you can’t see the state on the world map when you’re in EB or a different BL). There’s kind of an unplanned fix but I have no idea when it’ll make it to live. Tracking issue.

comments.author: ZedTheYeti.2956
comments.body: The API doesn’t appear to expose any data about the shrines in WvW. I couldn’t find any info on this so I was wondering if there was a technical reason for this or if it was a planned feature. It would be kinda nice to have I think.
